appearances.title: Chris Jansing Reports : MSNOW : January 12, 2026 9:00am-11:00am PST
appearances.snippet: want to bring in minnesota congresswoman kelly morrison, she and her colleagues, ilhan omar and angie craig, were denied entry to an ice detention center in minneapolis over the weekend. congresswoman, can you explain to us what happened when you went to that federal facility? >> of course. so, congresswoman omar craig and i presented ourselves to the whipple building to perform what is both our legal right and our constitutional duty to perform congressional oversight of this ice facility. as you know, there's been a surge of ice agents in our communities and in our state. it is sowing chaos and confusion and fear and terrorizing our communities. and we went there because we need transparency. you know, we lost renee. good. she was killed in broad daylight, unarmed, in her car, mother of three. and they are now saying they want to do an investigation that excludes local law enforcement. you know, minnesota has been through a series of tragedies over the past year when my former friend and colleague melissa hortman and her husband were assassinated, there was a joint investigation with the

appearances.title: Chris Jansing Reports : MSNOW : January 16, 2026 9:00am-11:00am PST
appearances.snippet: so i want to play for you a portion of a comment we heard from minnesota representative angie craig,enee. good. take a listen. >> this administration isn't using the law. they're going outside the law. and look, if ice agents want to point out that the woman who was killed, renee good and her partner becca good are lesbians to ice. ice say this state elects lesbians to the state house, the state senate and to congress from republican districts. this is not who we are in minnesota. >> so we expect to hear from representative craig, as well as the roughly two dozen other democratic lawmakers currently holding the shadow hearing. in just a couple of moments. and again, expect to get their takeaways as they explore and scrutinize ice conduct in minneapolis, saint paul and the broader state of minnesota. chris. >> thank you. now to capitol hill, where ms. now's michael schnell is following president trump's meeting with senate minority leader chuck schumer. what do we know about it? >> yeah, chris, pretty fascinating and surprising, right? we learned that yesterday. president trump had me

appearances.title: The Weekend: Primetime : MSNOW : January 11, 2026 3:00pm-6:00pm PST
appearances.snippet: congresswoman angie craig and kaylee morrison and myself brought a copy of that court case that you justerenced. we brought a copy of the bill that trump himself signed into law in his first administration, and we made our case on why it was very important for us to be allowed to fulfill our oversight duties as members of congress. but again, the ice agents kept reiterating that it was because of the big, beautiful bill that we could no longer continue with our tour, and that was it, that they weren't going to give us any further explanation. we told them that they were breaking the law, and they said they understood. that was also their understanding that they were breaking the law for not allowing us to do our oversight. but there was nothing else that they could do, and it was clear that they might have gotten a call from washington, probably gnome herself. >> congresswoman, in the brief time that you were there in the facility with your fellow congressional members from minnesota. what did you see and observe about how the treated? >> we weren't really able to see the treatment of th

appearances.title: News : PRESSTV : January 10, 2026 10:30pm-10:37pm IRST
appearances.snippet: democrat lawmakers, elhan homar and angie craig briefly joined the protest before entering the building. other rallies are among more than 1, weekend events planned nationwide. protesters are demanding an end to expanded ice deployments ordered by president donald trump. minneapolis has become the focal point after mother of three was shot and killed by ice officer during a traffic stop on wednesday. since then the us has seen protests in multiple cities demanding that ice leave their cities. and with that it brings us to the end of this world news bulletin. thank you all so much for staying with us. this is the bobbleman dub straight, the gate of tears and one the most vital maritime channels in the world. most cargo operators now won't send their boats through the state straight connecting the red sea with the gulf of aiden that's known as the gates of grief. 12% the world's maritime. trade is carried out through the suwez canal and all ships passing through this canal must pass through the bubble mandap straight, area that has become the scene of major international naval battle over
